alert.note: Alert for Lane (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 6:08AM PST until December 20 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Siuslaw River near Mapleton affecting Lane County. For the Nw Oregon / Sw Washington Coast...including Willapa, Naselle, Rosburg, Vernonia, Foss, Tillamook, Tillamook, Beaver, Siletz, Tidewater, Mapleton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Siuslaw River near Mapleton. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 18.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low lying dairy land along with some structures right along the banks of the Siuslaw River in and near Mapleton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM PST Monday the stage was 17.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.3 feet on 11/19/2012. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 400 PM PST.
